title: Long-Term Care Facilities
prompt: A weathered wooden sign reading a facility name hangs beside a quiet rural road lined with bare trees, shot in soft morning light with muted golden tones; in the foreground, an empty parking lot stretches toward a modest single-story brick building, its windows dark, conveying abandonment and loss without melodrama; captured in documentary style with shallow depth of field emphasizing the isolation of the structure against an overcast rural landscape.
